      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object Bencoder2.decode(byte[] bencoded_bytes)
      Decodes a bencoded object represented by the byte array.
      static byte[] Bencoder2.encode(java.lang.Object o)
      Bencodes the specified object as a byte[].
      static byte[] RUBTClient.getFileBytes(java.lang.String fileName)
      Returns the byte array of a file to be used with Bencoder2.java.

      Extracts the bencoded 'info' dictionary from a metainfo torrent file.
      static void RUBTClient.main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is the main method that is called upon program startup, this method is tasked with validating the program's arguments and then instantiating the other classes need to run the program.
